name: Siege of Terra
summary: Siege of Terra (Secundus 13) - Horus' army lays siege to the Emperor's Palace for fifty-five days. When he detects the fleets of the Dark Angels and Space Wolves approaching, Horus drops his ship's shields to entice the Emperor into a personal confrontation. The Emperor, Sanguinius, and Rogal Dorn teleport onboard Horus' battle barge Vengeful Spirit. Horus kills Sanguinius before the Emperor utterly obliterates Horus. Rogal Dorn carries the mortally wounded Emperor to the Golden Throne to keep Him alive.
